about_the_game:
TritonXR: LIVE turns ANY venue into a dynamic multiplayer combat arena. Scan your venue in, setup in minutes, and run your LBE experinces from anywhere!

NOTE: TritonXR: Reality Warfare LIVE is designed for LBE businesses. If you're a consumer, please check out TritonXR: Reality Warfare (visit our developer page above)!

World-First XR

TritonXR has the latest of XR tech - the "Real Life Mode" utilises the Quest 3/3s's XR features to create a mode where it truly feels like you're battling IRL! This world-first mode captivates consumers every time.

Extremely Easy Setup

We've designed the game to be operated regardless of user skill level, for both players and operators. Setup anywhere in minutes!

Scaled For Your Venue

TritonXR allows you to scan your arena into the game. Turn obstacles in the space into cover, and create your own maps easily. Pre-made maps are also available for you to use.

The world's most advanced XR game is here - turn any venue into the ultimate multiplayer combat arena in TritonXR: LIVE!

name: TritonXR: Reality Warfare LIVE

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD 2.5 GHz
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GEFORCE GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11 64-bit
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GEFORCE GTX 3060
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: TritonXR: LIVE turns ANY venue into a dynamic multiplayer combat arena. Scan your venue in, setup in minutes, and run your LBE experinces from anywhere!
